articles.content: When Kenan Thompson isn't playing a single dad in his new NBC sitcom, Kenan, he's being a real-life dad to his two daughters, Georgia and Gianna, and a husband to his wife of nearly 10 years, interio… [+2595 chars]

articles.title: Facebook is about to launch an Android-based Apple Watch competitor - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Facebook is about to launch an Android-based Apple Watch competitor. Facebook is about to launch its own rival to Apple Watch.
articles.content: Facebook is about to launch its own rival to Apple Watch – the company is working on smartwatches with a focus on “health and messaging”. This was reported by The Information website with reference t… [+3360 chars]
